data.name: Type Of Flight
data.description:
The option can be made to select one of the three flight options available:
Enter one of the following option value: 
1. Radiosonde with Pressure Sensor
2. Radiosonde without Pressure Sensor
3. Pilotsonde

data.name: Receiver Port
data.description:
Will by default expect the receiver comport connection on this port.
Will select default iff there is an actual connection on this port

data.name: Radiosonde Port
data.description:
Will by default expect the radiosonde comport connection on this port.
Will select default iff there is an actual connection on this port

data.name: Receiver Frequency
data.description:
The Radiosonde receiver will be made to receive on this frequency.
 Specify any other default value in the range 400-406MHz

data.name: Export Path
data.description: The Flight data folder will be made inside the folder specified by the path.
